analysis.description:
MintDRCT.mintUptoCap (/unique_chucks/27/0x5225f66168cc9c145b885d7af72054b52dbe1a0f.sol#256-269) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool)(MintableToken(ownedContract).balanceOf(mainAccounts[i]) == 0)

Reentrancy in OwnerContract.changeOwnershipto (/unique_chucks/27/0x5225f66168cc9c145b885d7af72054b52dbe1a0f.sol#177-186):
	External calls:
	- ownedContract.transferOwnership(_nextOwner) (/unique_chucks/27/0x5225f66168cc9c145b885d7af72054b52dbe1a0f.sol#181-184)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- ownedContract (/unique_chucks/27/0x5225f66168cc9c145b885d7af72054b52dbe1a0f.sol#184)

Reentrancy in OwnerContract.transferOwnershipBack (/unique_chucks/27/0x5225f66168cc9c145b885d7af72054b52dbe1a0f.sol#166-172):
	External calls:
	- ownedContract.transferOwnership(origOwner) (/unique_chucks/27/0x5225f66168cc9c145b885d7af72054b52dbe1a0f.sol#170)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- origOwner (/unique_chucks/27/0x5225f66168cc9c145b885d7af72054b52dbe1a0f.sol#172)
	- ownedContract (/unique_chucks/27/0x5225f66168cc9c145b885d7af72054b52dbe1a0f.sol#170-172)

MintDRCT.mintUptoCap has external calls inside a loop:
	- require(bool)(MintableToken(ownedContract).balanceOf(mainAccounts[i]) == 0) (/unique_chucks/27/0x5225f66168cc9c145b885d7af72054b52dbe1a0f.sol#260-263)

MintDRCT.mintUptoCap has external calls inside a loop:
	- res = MintableToken(ownedContract).mint(mainAccounts[i],accountCaps[mainAccounts[i]]) && res (/unique_chucks/27/0x5225f66168cc9c145b885d7af72054b52dbe1a0f.sol#264-266)

Reentrancy in OwnerContract.changeOwnershipto (/unique_chucks/27/0x5225f66168cc9c145b885d7af72054b52dbe1a0f.sol#177-186):
	External calls:
	- ownedContract.transferOwnership(_nextOwner) (/unique_chucks/27/0x5225f66168cc9c145b885d7af72054b52dbe1a0f.sol#181-184)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- origOwner (/unique_chucks/27/0x5225f66168cc9c145b885d7af72054b52dbe1a0f.sol#185)
MintDRCT.TOTAL_SUPPLY_CAP should be constant (/unique_chucks/27/0x5225f66168cc9c145b885d7af72054b52dbe1a0f.sol#188-189)
